phrases: Even now, that scene is burned into my mind.
The blooming fireworks in the midsummer sky...
Saying a thing like that out of nowhere...
That stupid, blank looking face of yours...
Well, you can be a pain sometimes, but I think you are a nice girl too.
That is not what I meant...
Once the new semester starts, we All Hanshin-Kyojin need to do our best too.
Hey, how about the two of us auditioning for a comedy show?
I will never forget what happened that day.
I will curse you until your great-grandchildren are born.
I will make it so you never laugh again.
Man, what the heck is your problem?!
You have been cursing me every day since the new semester started.
I am going to curse you and make you shrink 1cm every day.
In 156 days, you will vanish completely.
You in the ghost costume, and Mr Promoter over there!
This idiot is spouting pointless crap and getting in my way.
An idiot like you should not be calling me an idiot!
Just what is wrong with you?
You have been upset since back then.
Are you saying you really do not know what you did?!
I gave you my most treasured belonging!
You should show me more gratitude.
That, I am thankful for that.
I was so happy I thought I would die.
Hurry up and find some customers.
What the heck is wrong with her?
Well, it is to be expected.
Do you really think you have not done anything?!
We have something very fun here today!
All right everyone, please line up!
Three's haunted house is seriously freaky.
I heard their ghost will chase you to the ends of the earth.
None of that matters to me anymore.
Thanks for all your hard work.
Thanks to you, we made a ton this morning!
We are switching shifts in the afternoon.
Want to go look around with Otani-kun?
Risa, you failed once and you are already giving up?
If only his idiocy could be cured...
Well, I seriously thought about whether I would be able to do that,
Hey, who do you think you are?
At this stage it is beyond simple density.
How about the two of us auditioning for a comedy show?
I do not care about that guy anymore.
But the class trip is coming up pretty soon...
What will you do during our free time?
I was going to hang around with you, Nobu-chan.
But I want to be alone with my darling.
Even though it is a class trip, for my darling and I, it will be our first trip away together.
The romantic night view of Hakodate...
Naturally, Chiharu-chan and Suzuki-kun will want to be alone too.
So basically you will be left alone with Otani-kun anyway.
Otherwise you will just be all by yourself.
Koizumi-san, everyone is looking for you.
No one wants to come if you are not playing the ghost.
I will do the afternoon shift too.
I did something terrible to you.
The guy you like found out that you were with me on your birthday...
What is with this cold atmosphere?!
I am amazed he came up with such a complicated theory.
I am so surprised I cannot even be sad.
He is been saying things like that for a while now.
What the heck is it, then?!
That is exactly what it was.
The guy I like found out and got the wrong idea.
I know that is not it.
I am the one that is annoyed, you imbecile!
That is the first time I have heard anyone use that word.
That is the first time I have had to use it on anyone too!
Do not use weird words like that!
You just do not understand because you are so dense!
What do you make of that?!
You should not make bad impulse jokes, idiot!
That is the first time I have heard that one too.
They seem to be well matched, huh?
Do you want to step in?
The one Risa likes is you, Otani-kun.
You guys are just keeping me in the dark in order to make a fool out of me!
Someone bring me something to hit him with!
Something that will really hurt him!
Why would anyone lie about something like that?
Huh, you did not come to see me?
Um, well... the haunted house was a huge hit so she is pretty worn out.
Take a little rest at our cafe.
Yes, let us do that, Risa.
Would you like to try one?
So your class is running this cafe?
I told you that I made club president last time, did not I?
Did you say something like that?
So you really do not care about me at all.
I did not say full dentures...
Your head is just filled with thoughts of that midget.
I am not thinking about that idiot...
You are not thinking about me at all.
Do you know who I like?
How can you ask me that?!
It is that midget, of course!
Oh, so you are all here.
So you are in the Home Ec. Club too, Seiko-chan?
I am just a junior member who joined recently.
Oh my, what is going on here?
Why did you bring that midget here?!
How can you have that kind of attitude with a customer?!
I regret to inform you that our establishment does not serve gentlemen of diminutive stature.
Let us go somewhere else, Nobu-chan.
Hey, do you know who Koizumi likes too?
Why the hell are you asking me?!
Why should I have to verbalize it again?!
He is just never thought that I could like him in that way.
Basically, he is never even considered that as a possibility.
He is completely calm because he thinks it is impossible!
I just do not like to see you like this, Risa.
Whenever I think about how Risa is feeling, I just cannot feel happy.
Come on, Risa, let us go!
It is time for the outdoor folk dance!
There was an extra girl last year, remember?
Since I am so tall, I ended up in the boys line and had to dance with all the girls.
It was not fun at all.
We are done with the cleaning.
He went to take out the trash.
I just want to be alone with my thoughts.
Such a huge girl falling for such a short guy, of all people...
Otani only think of me as his All Kyojin.
Oh, it is just you, Otani.
Do not scare me like that!
And with all the lights off too...
I confessed to the guy I like, but he brushed me off.
Hey, why do not I go and try to tell him for you one more time?
I described the guy I like to you, did not I?
He is shorter than you, he is in the basketball club, he is an idiot...
Did you ever even think that the guy might be you?
I am tired of looking at that stupid face of yours.
Do not make that face in front of me again, idiot!
Try getting a clue, you idiot!
An idiot like you should not be calling me an idiot!
I confessed to the guy I like, but he brushed me off.
The one Risa likes is you, Otani-kun.
Did you ever even think that the guy might be you?
He must have realized by now...
Still... even if it is just once...
I am really the one Koizumi likes?
Do not bring that up again on the morning of the class trip!
It is because you are like that that I did not notice.
